review: What's the highest amount someone can deposit into the moniepoint account?
response_body: Hi! Level 3 is the highest limit for the Moniepoint personal account. This level has an unlimited single and daily credit limit; this means that your account has no credit transaction limit. On the other hand, your single debit limit is N1,000,000, while the daily debit limit is N25,000,000. We'd appreciate a 5star ratings from you. Thank you!

review: I think you should create a platform to help we the customers to save our earnings for future purpose just like other digital banks‚Ä¶ I think I would prefer saving my money with moniepoint than anyother digital bank because moniepoint is always the best‚ù§Ô∏è So please work on it and keep up your good works, thank you‚ù§Ô∏è
response_body:
Hi there, You can create a Savings plan on Moniepoint: Log in to your Moniepoint account via the app. Tap the savings icon in the lower right corner of the screen.

Select your preferred savings plan from the options available: Flex Savings, Monielock, or Fixed Deposit. Each plan has a brief description.
Choose the most suitable plan and click "Start Saving."
Enter your savings details and proceed by clicking "Next."
Review the summary of your savings information and agree to the terms and conditions. Click "Create Plan."
Optionally, you can edit your savings plan before finalizing.
Please note Flex Savings and Monielock plans comply with halal standards, and you have the option to opt-out of earning interest.

This simple process enables you to set up your Savings plan conveniently on the Moniepoint app. Feel free to reach out to us via store.support@moniepoint.com for further assistance and inquiry.

review:
I've been using moniepoint for several months now, and it has truly transformed the way I manage my finances. This app goes above and beyond to deliver value for money, and here's why:

1. Comprehensive Financial Management:From tracking daily expenses to setting savings goals, moniepoint offers a suite of tools that make budgeting simple and effective.

2. Excellent Customer Support:The customer service is outstanding. Whenever I've had a question or issue, their support team has been prompt and helpful, ensuring a seamless experience.

3. Secure and Reliable:Security is a top priority with moniepoint. The app uses advanced encryption to protect my data, giving me peace of mind that my financial information is safe.

4. Intuitive and User-Friendly: The interface is clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate. Even complex tasks like managing multiple accounts or setting up automated payments are straightforward.
5. Great Value: The app‚Äôs features and benefits far exceed what I expected. It provides tools and insights that help me make the most of my money, saving me time and maximizing my financial potential.

Overall, moniepoint is a must-have for anyone looking to get the best value from their banking app. It‚Äôs a reliable and user-friendly platform that has greatly enhanced my financial management. Highly recommended!
response_body: Thank you for choosing Moniepoint, Damouchi. We appreciate your feedback and we will ensure to continue delivering exceptional service. Feel free to reach out to us via store.support@moniepoint.com for further assistance and inquiries.

review: Your app is good and all with the fast transfers,airtime purchases,bill payments etc but if you guys could create a master card for the atm it would be a lot of help because not everyone would want to use a commercial bank with the master card option but if it where possible you guys should create a master card so people could buy stuff on online shops that only accept master card and visa you guys could just make it and give the option for people that already have the verve card to upgrade for a little fee while those that doesn‚Äôt have the verve card could choose to either buy the master card or verve card or if you can‚Äôt do the master card you could do the verve card any one is better if not I don‚Äôt have any complaints for your services
response_body: Hi there, thank you very much for your suggestion and feedback. Please be informed that Moniepoint issues both Mastercard and Verve card based on your preference. Feel free to reach out to us via store.support@moniepoint.com for further assistance and inquiries.

review:
This has to be the fastest banking app I have ever experienced in this country. The fact that I can be very confident when going around knowing my card won‚Äôt be declined or knowing that my app won‚Äôt fail is all the assurance I need. 

When I had my account restricted, as soon as I sent an email to the support department, it was rectified in the same hour. I have never seen any bank respond with such speed in Nigeria. 

Also, this app has savings and they give 16%. I didn‚Äôt know until I found it in the app. I wonder why they have not started advertising it. 

I started using it when my friends recommended it after I had a payment delay. And I have not regretted it to this day. 

Now I can even earn money just be referring people. No wonder almost everyone in my area is using it. 

Keep the good job going, Moniepoint.
response_body: Thank you for choosing Moniepoint. We appreciate your feedback and we will ensure to continue delivering exceptional service.

Hello there, we understand your concern regarding the SMS charge, and we want to assure you that we hear your feedback. Unfortunately, we're unable to change or waive these charges. However, if you feel that the frequency of SMS notifications is too high, you might want to consider adjusting your notification preferences through the app or opting for email notifications instead, if available. review: Why did i request for the deletion of my account yet you didn‚Äôt delete it
response_body:
Hello Motunrayo, thank you for contacting Moniepoint. To successfully close your Moniepoint account you would be required to carry out he following steps: Log in to your dashboard and access settings by clicking on the photo icon located at the top left corner of the screen, Choose 'Close Account' and proceed by clicking 'Proceed', Select the specific account you wish to close, Provide the reason for closing the account, Complete the face verification process, Enter your transaction pin, then continue to submit.

Please be informed that accounts on Post-No-Debit (PND) status with a balance exceeding N500.00 cannot be deleted. Kindly wait for the PND status to be released before attempting to delete such an account.
If your account holds over N500, transfer the funds to another account before attempting to delete it. Your request will be reviewed by our team and processed accordingly.

Do not hesitate to contact us at store.support@moniepoint.com if you have further questions or require additional information. Thank you.

review:
As someone who has tried countless financial management apps over the years, MoniePoint stands out as a game-changer in the realm of personal finance. This app has seamlessly integrated into my daily routine, providing a comprehensive and user-friendly platform for managing all aspects of my financial life.

User Interface:
The first thing that struck me about MoniePoint is its clean, intuitive, and visually appealing interface. The design is both modern and practical, making navigation a breeze even for those who may not be tech-savvy. Everything is clearly labeled, and the layout is thoughtfully organized to ensure that users can find what they need quickly and efficiently.

Features:
MoniePoint offers a plethora of features that cater to all my financial needs. From tracking daily expenses to managing investments and setting budget goals, this app does it all. The automatic categorization of expenses is incredibly accurate, saving me time and effort. The ability to link multiple bank accounts and credit cards allows for a holistic view of my finances in one place.

Budgeting and Savings Goals:
One of my favorite features is the budgeting tool. MoniePoint provides detailed insights into spending patterns and offers customizable budget options. Setting and tracking savings goals has never been easier, thanks to the app‚Äôs smart notifications and reminders. It‚Äôs like having a personal financial advisor in your pocket!

Security:
Security is always a concern when it comes to financial apps, but MoniePoint has gone above and beyond to ensure user data is protected. The app uses bank-level encryption and offers biometric login options for added peace of mind. I feel confident knowing my financial information is secure.

Customer Support:
The customer support team is responsive, knowledgeable, and genuinely interested in helping users. Any queries or issues I‚Äôve had were addressed promptly and effectively, which adds tremendous value to the overall experience.

Overall Experience:
MoniePoint has transformed the way I manage my finances. It‚Äôs not just an app; it‚Äôs a comprehensive financial ecosystem that empowers users to take control of their financial future. Whether you‚Äôre looking to get out of debt, save for a big purchase, or simply gain better insight into your spending habits, MoniePoint is the ultimate tool for financial success.

In conclusion, I highly recommend MoniePoint to anyone seeking a reliable, feature-rich, and secure financial management app. It‚Äôs truly a five-star experience that has exceeded my expectations in every way.
response_body:
Hi there, thank you for such an incredible and detailed review of Moniepoint! We‚Äôre absolutely delighted to hear that our app has made such a significant impact on your financial management journey. Your kind words about our user interface, features, and security measures truly motivate us to keep improving and innovating. We‚Äôre especially glad to know that you find our budgeting tools and savings goals feature helpful. Our team works hard to ensure that Moniepoint provides everything you need in one convenient and secure place, and it‚Äôs wonderful to hear that we‚Äôve exceeded your expectations. If you ever have more feedback or suggestions on how we can make your experience even better, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us via store.support@moniepoint.com. 
Thanks again for being such a valued part of the Moniepoint community!

response_body: Hell there, I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with your funds while using the Moniepoint app. I understand how frustrating that can be. Let's work together to resolve this as quickly as possible. Kindly provide more details about the specific transactions where your money was deducted unexpectedly to us at store.support@moniepoint.com. This will help us investigate the issue thoroughly and take appropriate action to rectify it. However, if you have any screenshots or error messages related to these deductions, please share them with us. In the meantime, I recommend checking your transaction history within the app to verify the deductions and ensure there are no unauthorized transactions. review: Monie point should post their ussd code right here
response_body: Hi Annajat, thank you for choosing Moniepoint. You can enable your USSD banking feature, simply login to your account, click on the app settings, In the Business and Transaction section you would find the USSD Banking (*5573#) click on the button to enable feature. For further assistance and inquiry please contact store.support@moniepoint.com.
